svg.text: Creating and settings of the project
DEBUG - shows mode of site work
for templates for example, utf-8 as
stored route of project level in string type.
SECRET_KEY - empty row as default. Used bvy
ENGINE - format of the used DB
NAME - path to file of DB
CON_MAX_AGE - max time of connection with BD
registered in project. It is empty as default,
but after creating project it consist of
Any of thuse can be removed as unusing.
requests and pass it to the controller,
and end handling of response generated
from controller. It is empty as default,
but after creating project it consist of
realize additional protection of network attacks.
provides sessions work on low level.
participate in pre handling of queries.
provides protection of intersite queries in data handling.
provides handling of pop up messages in low level.
realize additional protection of network attacks.
USE_L18N - if True, numbers, date and
TIME_ZONE - value of time zone in string
USE_TZ - if True, stores date and time
with use time zone. Otherwise it will store
